refnamediv.refpurpose: Discrete-time analytic signal computation of a real signal using Hilbert transform

listitem.para: real vector : the real signal samples
Complex vector: the discrete-time analytic signal.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Returns theanalytic signal, from a real data sequence.

The analytic signal x= xr + i*xi has a real part, xr, which is the original data, and an imaginary part, xi, which contains the Hilbert transform. The imaginary part is a version of the original real sequence with a 90Â° phase shift.
